incidents.name: TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification and Short Codes, PN Provisioning, Pricing Page API and Flex Studio Systems are Impacted

incident_updates.body: The TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, Short Codes system, PN Provisioning, and Flex Studio are fully functional again. This incident has been resolved.

We have been informed that a fix is implemented and the TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, and Short Codes systems are functional. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers attempting to access TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, and Short Codes systems will receive 5xx in the console and API. Additionally, PN provisioning and Flex Studio are also impacted. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers attempting to access TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, and Short Codes systems will receive 5xx in the console and API. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Stale Data in Messaging Insights

incident_updates.body: Twilio Messaging Insights was degraded for 430 minutes between 15:20 Pacific Time on 09/18/2024 and 22:30 Pacific Time on 09/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have seen stale data in Messaging Insights when querying for data in this time range. The issue has now been resolved.
